snippet: The boy was shot on East Tremont Avenue, between Jerome and Walton Avenues, the police said; he was taken in stable condition to St. Barnabas Hospital for treatment.

byline.original: By ASHLEY SOUTHALL and KATE PASTOR

lead_paragraph: The boy was shot on East Tremont Avenue, between Jerome and Walton Avenues, the police said; he was taken in stable condition to St. Barnabas Hospital for treatment.

headline.main: 12-Year-Old Boy Is Shot in the Bronx
